name: TLPL420
title: Knowledge, Reasoning, and Learning in Science
description: Restriction: Minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75; and permission of EDUC-Teaching and Learning, Policy and Leadership department. Credit only granted for: TLPL420 or EDCI411. Formerly: EDCI411. For prospective science teachers. Investigations of the nature of knowledge, reasoning, and learning in middle and secondary science. Readings from cognitive science and science education research; studies of student thinking in interview and classroom observations; analyses of curricula. Includes laboratory and field experiences.
